features: 🛌3000LBS HEAVY DUTY-Strong structure queen bed frame give excellent support for your box spring and foam mattress (not included)

🔨EASY ASSEMBLY- The integrated compact design can be set up within 10 minutes (no tools needed); bracket including for headboard or footboard connection
🚗EASY MOVING-Small parcel in a compact package, convenient for doors and stairs
🎉5 YEAR WARRANTY-Measures 76 by 60 by 7 inches (LxWxH); weighs 25 pounds; 5 year limited warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Reliable Bed Frame!
reviews.reviewText: I just got the Noah Megatron King Size Metal Bed Frame, and let me tell you, it's a total game-changer for my sleep setup. This thing is sturdy! It's got a 7-inch frame and nine legs that make it feel super stable – no more shaky nights. It's a beast in holding up my mattress and box spring, and it doesn't even flinch under weight.Putting it together was surprisingly easy and required no tools. Plus, it’s adjustable which perfectly accounts for slight variations in box spring sizes. Lastly, the sleek black look really pulls my room together. It's modern without sticking out like a sore thumb.The best part is my sleep has improved big time. No creaks, no wobbles, just solid, undisturbed rest. If you're on the hunt for a bed frame that's strong, stylish, and doesn't break the bank, the Noah Megatron is the way to go. It's been a fantastic addition to my bedroom – totally worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, Low-Profile, and Great Value
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought a new mattress and box spring and needed a new bed frame as well. My criteria was specific—I wanted something low to the floor, solidly built, and reasonably priced. After much consideration, I settled on this bed frame. Setting up the frame was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and all the components fit together seamlessly, making the assembly process smooth and hassle-free.It’s well-made, sturdy, and provides a solid foundation for my mattress and box spring. The bottom of the box spring sits comfortably 7 inches off the floor, bringing the total height of the bed to 25 inches—just the way I like it!**Middle Leg Placement**One aspect I hadn’t considered was the placement of the middle legs. While they are visible in the product photos, I didn’t fully grasp the implications of their positioning until I had a couple of midnight encounters with them. I also bumped into them while making the bed. Since then, I have learned to navigate around them and their placement is no longer an issue for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for beds with high box spring
reviews.reviewText: Very solid product for the price. I leave my mattress and box spring on the floor it will trap the moisture. So I want something that brings the mattress and box spring up from the ground a little bit which will help with the circulation. This is low to the ground. This bed frame is very solid and easy to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy bed frame, but side-center leg is perfectly positioned to stub your toe
reviews.reviewText: This is a very sturdy and easy-to-assemble bed frame. However, there is one very annoying and actually painful design flaw.The frame has nine legs, one in each corner, one at the mid-point of each of the four sides, and one in the very center. The legs have dolts which screw into the frame parts and secure the sections to one another. Very clever and effective, sturdy.But, the leg at the center of each side is perfectly positioned to stub your toes on when getting into bed, changing sheets, or making the bed.This design flaw could have been engineered out by using an actual bolt at the same position, and securing these two legs several inches inward, on the crosspiece.I installed AC pipe insulation to provide cushioning for my sore toes. See photos. This is helpful, but it’s still annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: As a heavy person I can say this frame feels very secure and heavy duty when lying on the bed. I definitely recommend if you need heavy duty or even an upgrade to a standard bed frame.

reviews.reviewText: Wow. Great product. Fast easy assembly. Super sturdy. Perfect for our 2 king box springs and king mattress! Love it.

reviews.reviewText: We are very heavy people so I was worried buying this but read all the info and reviews I must say it's solid was easy to put together I'm very happy with my purschase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: This thing is solid as all hell!
reviews.reviewText: I am a big guy. I have a queen size bed the mattress, box spring and even the bedframe was all bend and broken down. Eventually I did get everything replaced, however I started with the bedframe and this thing made sleeping 50% better even with a broken up box spring and sagging mattress. once I got THOSE replaced I'm sleeping solidly throughout the night now! 10% recommended if you've had bad experiences with bedframes ort of slightly larger build..
